definitions: the fact of two or more events or circumstances happening or existing at the same time

examples.text: the unfortunate concurrency of both high debt and high unemployment

shortDefinitions: fact of two or more events or circumstances happening or existing at same time

definitions: the ability to execute more than one program or task simultaneously

examples.text: a high level of concurrency is crucial to good performance in a multiuser database system
a too liberal access policy has triggered some nasty concurrency issues

shortDefinitions: ability to execute more than one program simultaneously
